name: babbity hats in 3 colours
sizes_available: very small preemie, small preemie, medium preemie, large preemie, newborn, 0 - 3 months, 6 months
notes:
i have knitted dozens of babbity baby hats - in all sorts of colour combinations ! they always look good.  it is one of my most popular designs. 

this version uses 3 colours - and is a great way of using up small oddments of yarn left over from other projects.

requires:
dk yarn (just 6g for the smallest size - 22g for the largest size)
4mm needles

sizes:
very small preemie, small preemie, medium preemie, large preemie, newborn, 0 - 3 months, 6 months

this cute little hat is perfect for boys or girls 

perfect for charity donation ~ or ~ a pretty gift for a baby shower
